title: Youtube like rating script jquery php
description: It's worth disabling JavaScript for this site - the whole page uses JavaScript to redirect to an advertiser's site. PHP code features variable as well as SQL injection. Have [contacted the author](https://twitter.com/ilovephp/status/525794166803292160) but not received a reply.

issues.description: The use of `extract()` to create variables from unfiltered user input is risky, since it can have malicious uses
